step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped loosely in your lap, and try to relax your shoulders down.
You're raising your hands well. Focus on keeping your elbows close to your head as you bring your hands up.
Nicely done spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Maintain an upright posture and avoid pulling forward.
Great hold! You maintained good form throughout the 30 seconds.
Smooth reversal. Return to the starting position with control, keeping your shoulders relaxed.
Second rep starting well. Remember to keep those elbows close to your head as you lift.
Good upward movement. Continue to focus on maintaining elbow proximity to your head.
Excellent spread! Your elbows are wide, and your posture is upright. Keep up the great work.
Well held! You're maintaining good form and control during this hold.
Smooth return to the start. You completed the second set with good technique.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Focus on keeping your elbows close to your head when raising your hands and spreading them wide behind your head. Remember to maintain an upright posture throughout.
